live.name: Live dataset
live.description:
The **Live** dataset contains data of a meditation mobile app with subscription business model. :iphone:

The data is updated **daily**. You can run queries to calculate metrics for the past 24h, week, month, etc. and build dashboards as if you were actually working for that company. :bar_chart:

finance.name: Finance dataset
finance.description:
This data warehouse simply contains all company's financial transactions. :dollar:

If the company paid for something – there's a **debit** transaction with negative amount. If someone paid the company – it's a **credit** transaction with positive amount. :moneybag:
